attributes.action: Reduce the fuel tax by 50% and increase tax on cigarette & alcohol by 25% respectively
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the government REALLY CARES about the health & public safety risk to the young people(THE FUTURE OF THIS NATION) especially, STOP THE LIP SERVICE and implement this Petition. Win hearts & minds.. & votes by showing you SINCERELY CARE.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
